item.description:
Saturday, December 1

TIME: 4-7pm

COST: Free

A New England Tradition!
Kick off the holiday season with Nashoba Valley Winery's traditional holiday lighting at the orchard. Enjoy relaxed holiday shopping, hay rides through the orchard & cheerful holiday music. You do not want to iss this kick-off event of the season. The traditional lighting at the orchard is picture perfect New England charm. Come see the orchard twinkle with lights. Enjoy a hayride, holiday carols & browse The Wine Shoppe for unique holiday gifts.
Featuring:
*Award winning holiday wines
*Tastings
* Unique gift baskets & holiday shopping
*Special visit from Santa for the kids( arriving about 4:30pm)
* Anarray of foods to warm you
* Caroling with the Assabet Chambersingers
*Traditional Hamburger & Hot Dog BBQ

NOTE: This event takes place rain, snow or shine
The Merrimack Connection meetup group will also be
attending
item.name: Holiday Lighting Festival @ Nashoba Valley Winery
